title: Finance Manager
job_overview:
We’re looking for a meticulous and proactive Finance Manager to join our growing team! This is a fully remote role, but you’ll be working closely with UK-based clients and internal stakeholders. The ideal candidate has strong experience in UK accounting practices and is confident in managing both finance and HR operations.

This role involves a hybrid of responsibilities, from preparing full accounts and tax filings to administering payroll, recruiting talent, and supporting compliance matters. If you're detail-oriented, highly organized, and experienced in UK finance and HR procedures, we’d love to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities
— Prepare and issue invoices for the company and its clients (via Xero and manual methods)
— Handle quarterly VAT returns and year-end CT600 Corporation Tax filings using TaxCalc
— Prepare full statutory accounts and ensure compliance with Companies House and HMRC deadlines
— Perform regular bank reconciliations and maintain accurate transaction records
— Administer monthly payroll (including PAYE for Directors) for internal staff and client teams
— Monitor year-to-date salary and material purchase records using Excel
— Source and manage supplier records; handle payment processing using company credit card
— Generate and analyze financial reports via Xero
— Maintain timely and professional communication with clients regarding financial inquiries

Qualifications
— Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or any related field
— Chartered Accountant certification (ICAEW, ACCA, or equivalent) is a strong advantage
— Minimum of 5 years of UK-based accounting experience
— Demonstrated experience handling full statutory accounts and corporation tax (CT600)
— Proficient with Xero and TaxCalc accounting software
— Strong working knowledge of UK tax regulations and financial compliance
— Skilled in Google Sheets, Upgrade to see actual info, and RingCentral
— Excellent communication skills (written and verbal)
— Highly organized, dependable, and detail-oriented
— Able to manage multiple streams of work independently

How to Apply
If you're passionate about financial accuracy, people operations, and cross-functional support, send your updated CV and a short cover letter highlighting your relevant experience to Upgrade to see actual info with the subject:
“Application for Finance Manager – [Your Name]”

This is a long-term opportunity to play a vital role in a dynamic and growing team. Join us and contribute to both our operational excellence and people-first culture!
